title: Irish stew
ingredients: ['4 boneless lean lamb leg steaks, about 500 g (1 lb 2 oz) in total, trimmed of fat and each steak cut into 4 pieces', '1 kg (2Â¼ lb) floury potatoes, peeled and thickly sliced', '1 large onion, sliced', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) carrots, thickly sliced', '2 tbsp chopped parsley', '1 tsp fresh thyme leaves', '1 tbsp snipped fresh chives', '450 ml (15 fl oz) hot lamb or vegetable stock', 'salt and pepper', 'chopped fresh thyme and parsley to garnish']
